definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: During the first half of life, people look ahead to the second half.
sentences.chinese: 在前半生裏，人們向前看後半生。

sentences.english: For much of my life I had little occasion to pay attention to eels.
sentences.chinese: 我的前半生很少有機會注意到鰻魚。

sentences.english: But during the second half of life, people look back the first half.
sentences.chinese: 而在後半生裏，人們回頭看前半生。

sentences.english: As if her whole life has been the prelude for this moment.
sentences.chinese: 就好像她的前半生都只是這一刻的序幕。

definition: not having to worry about clothes and food (idiom)/to be provided with the basic necessities
bumpy (of a road)/rough (of life)/to be down on one's luck/to be full of frustrations and dashed hopes
homeless and miserable (idiom); to wander about in a desperate plight/to drift
to be successful in business/professional success
